notesStmt.note: Title from colophon (f. 1v); alternate title derived from colophon (f. 1v) by writing the numeral 12 as a word.

Mistakes covered over in yellow or blacked out; some corrections and additions in margins; significant syllables, words, or phrases highlighted in red throughout; vertical margins marked with double red line. Text is divided into three columns and the words form a kind of diamond-shaped yantra (diagram) at the center of each column with four characters from the text at the center of each one (six in total). Text is incomplete.

msContents.summary: Manuscript is used for consultation and study and is a small section of a larger Jaina grammatical work, possibly with reference to grammatical compounds.
